hero.core_tension: Compressing a seasonal campaign into a concentrated early‑access window: show the decision to pull forward high-intent inventory and test whether earlier demand amplifies or cannibalizes peak moments.
hero.setting: Studio storefront mockup with a deep window ledge and polished concrete floor; background hints of a city holiday street out of focus.
hero.persona: Operator and studio creative leaning in — mid‑career retail operator in a blazer and a studio producer in a black turtleneck.
hero.action: They lean over a shared matte table reviewing layered physical artifacts (tags, wireframe cards, and sample bundles) while exchanging a confident gesture.
hero.urgency_symbol: Compressed light bands and overlapping shadow lanes falling across the table to suggest condensed timing and accelerated cadence (symbolic, not a clock).
props: bundle samples wrapped in craft paper
hero.lighting: Polished editorial lighting with confident highlights on faces and props, soft falloff into clean negative space; slight rim light to separate subjects from background.
hero.mood: Precise, collaborative, quietly urgent — operational focus with studio polish.
hero.alt: Two collaborators — a retail operator and a studio producer — lean over a matte table with campaign cards, bundled product samples, and loyalty mockups. Polished editorial light creates sharp highlights and bands of shadow that symbolically compress the scene, suggesting a tightened holiday timing window.

signal_map.structure: Concentric arcs and intersecting radial lanes forming a simplified location-and-timing lattice (rings for stages, arcs for channels).
elements: connector paths and dotted arcs showing directional influence
anchor nodes for flagship, pop-up, loyalty, and downtown activation
signal_map.motion: Subtle directional pulse along select paths (thicker pulses toward the inner ring for the early-access window), and a staggered glow that implies compressed flows and test cohorts.
signal_map.palette: Warm neutrals and deep charcoal base with accent metallic copper and muted holiday red—materials include matte paper, brushed metal, and soft glass reflections.
signal_map.alt: Abstract retail signal map: concentric arcs and radial lanes with discs labeled S1–S4, connector paths, and pulsing directions. Warm neutrals, copper accents, and glass reflections create a polished editorial diagram suggesting priority flows and compressed timing without UI elements.

case_studies.scene: In-store window pop-up vignette framed by a flagship display with a brand partner’s motif.
case_studies.moment: A ten‑day experiential launch at Thanksgiving week caught at the moment footfall converts into a tracked offer — timing compressed into a signature window (symbolized by converging spotlight bands).
case_studies.persona: Store operations lead adjusting POS signage while a visual merchandiser reviews QR-code cards with a tablet‑sized mockup (studio collaborator nearby).
props: staff radio clipped to a lapel
case_studies.lighting: Polished editorial window light with confident highlights on merchandise and soft bounces off glass surfaces.
case_studies.mood: Energetic, experiential, observant — measuring footfall-to-conversion in the moment.
case_studies.alt: Flagship pop-up scene: a store operations lead and a merchandiser stand beside branded fixtures and printed QR offer cards. Converging bands of light symbolically mark the short experiential window; polished highlights and reflective glass emphasize measured activity.

case_studies.scene: Backroom inventory staging area with a long metal table and labeled bundles ready for early-access fulfillment.
case_studies.moment: A throttle point where cadence changes ripple through staging and fulfillment — shown as overlapping rows of bundled SKUs and staggered packing slips aligned like a compressed timeline.
case_studies.persona: Fulfillment manager and operations planner inspecting bundle picks and inventory swatches together.
props: paired bundle boxes with craft ties
stacked packing slips and tagged inventory pins

case_studies.mood: Precise, methodical, focused on end‑to‑end latency and velocity.
case_studies.alt: Backroom staging: a fulfillment manager and operations planner review bundled boxes and packing slips on a metal table. Overhead editorial light creates sharp highlights along the bundles, suggesting compressed operational cadence and coordinated staging.

case_studies.scene: Window activation in a downtown district at dusk, with a brief leased frontage and coordinated street signage.
case_studies.moment: A short‑term downtown activation synchronized with local holiday programming — the tension suggested by layered street reflections and a narrowing depth of field that draws to the activation gateway.
case_studies.persona: Local events coordinator and store brand lead coordinating signage placement while scanning foot traffic patterns.
case_studies.lighting: Polished editorial dusk lighting with confident rim highlights and warm city bokeh in the background.
case_studies.alt: Downtown window activation at dusk: an events coordinator and brand lead position temporary window panels and event cards. Warm rim lighting and city bokeh symbolically compress the activation window, emphasizing local coordination and timing sensitivity.

case_studies.scene: Studio planning table with promo math laid out as tactile artifacts (bundle comps, margin notecards, loyalty overlays).
case_studies.moment: Deciding to swap a sitewide markdown for bundle+GWP and loyalty early-access — shown as layered cards where a bold margin card partially overlays a faded sitewide discount card, symbolizing a shift in promo mechanics.
case_studies.persona: Merchandise planner and financial analyst in discussion, pointing to margin overlays and projected unit economics printed on vellum.
case_studies.lighting: Clean editorial side light with confident highlights on paper textures and metallic accents on clips.
case_studies.alt: Studio table with promo math artifacts: a merchandise planner and financial analyst examine margin notecards, bundle mockups, and a loyalty pass. Side editorial lighting highlights paper textures and metallic clips, symbolically showing the transition from broad markdowns to margin-preserving bundles.
